title: Watch: India senior women and men's teams reactions after Shafali Verma and Co’s U19 World Cup win
content:
A special message from Lucknow for India's ICC Under-19 Women's T20 World Cup-winning team 🙌 🙌#TeamIndia | #U19T20WorldCup pic.twitter.com/g804UTh3WB— BCCI (@BCCI) January 29, 2023

From #TeamIndia to #TeamIndia🇮🇳  Well done!!! We are so proud of you! 🤝 pic.twitter.com/YzLsZtmNZr— BCCI Women (@BCCIWomen) January 29, 2023
author: Scroll Staff
tags: ICC Under 19 Women's T20 World Cup 2023
